basics.label: Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault Advocate
basics.summary: Certified Massachusetts Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault Advocate driven to help survivors overcome numerous intersecting social, mental and emotional obstacles.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault Advocate
work.summary: One-on-one counseling addressing emotional needs, coping skills, goals, and planning for survivors of domestic violence and sexual assault. Cross-trained as court advocate. Conducted training and presentations in the community regarding relevant social issues.
highlights: Registered attendance of 10-20 women at the YWCA Haverhill's first successful women's support group for survivors.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assisted attorney during major homicide trial including input on trial strategy, client interviews, organized case files in preparation for trial, and performed background research.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Student Advocate and Assistant Outreach Coordinator
work.summary: Organized the Community Educators, planned and arranged presentations, and designed new workflow processes to improve productivity. Also staffed emergency help line on campus.
